name: Lifestance Health Group, Inc.
description: Lifestance Health Group, Inc. is a leading provider of outpatient mental health services in the United States. Founded in 2017, the company is committed to transforming the way behavioral health care is delivered through a comprehensive, patient-centered approach. Lifestance operates a network of clinics that provide a range of services including therapy, medication management, and holistic treatment options for individuals of all ages. With a mission to improve the quality of life for patients by making mental health care more accessible and effective, the company leverages advanced technology to enhance patient engagement and treatment outcomes. Lifestance aims to destigmatize mental health issues and empower individuals through personalized care plans tailored to their unique needs. The company’s growth strategy includes expanding its clinic footprint and integrating telehealth services to reach underserved populations. With a focus on quality, collaboration, and community involvement, Lifestance is playing a vital role in addressing the rising demand for mental health services across the nation.

seo.meta_title: Lifestance Health Group, Inc. | Outpatient Mental Health Services
seo.meta_description: Lifestance Health Group, Inc. offers comprehensive outpatient mental health services. Discover how Lifestance is transforming behavioral healthcare.

faq.question: What services does Lifestance Health provide?
faq.answer: Lifestance Health provides therapy, medication management, and telehealth services for mental health care.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Lifestance Health?
faq.answer: Drew R. McGowan is the CEO of Lifestance Health Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Lifestance Health headquartered?
faq.answer: Lifestance Health is headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona, USA.
